title: Lee Trautsch
text: Lee Gary Trautsch (born 28 January 1971 in Sydney) is a retired male <a href="boxing">boxer</a> from Australia. He represented his native country at the <a href="1996%20Summer%20Olympics">1996 Summer Olympics</a> in <a href="Atlanta">Atlanta</a>, Georgia, where he was stopped in the first round of the men's light welterweight division (– 63.5 kg) by Tunisia's <a href="Fethi%20Missaoui">Fethi Missaoui</a>.
